mapper.insert: INSERT INTO broadcast_vod (broadcast_no, vod_path, duration, status) VALUES (#{broadcastNo}, #{vodPath}, #{duration}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT v.no AS vod_no, v.broadcast_no, v.vod_path, v.duration, v.view_count, v.created_at, b.start_time, b.end_time, bs.no AS schedule_no, bs.name AS title, bs.content, bs.date, bs.thumbnail_path, c.name AS category_name, l.no AS lawyer_no, l.name AS lawyer_name, l.profile AS lawyer_profile FROM broadcast_vod v JOIN broadcast b ON v.broadcast_no = b.no JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON b.schedule_no = bs.no JOIN category c ON bs.category_no = c.no JOIN lawyer l ON b.user_no = l.no WHERE v.status = 0 AND v.broadcast_no = #{broadcastNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM broadcast_vod v JOIN broadcast b ON v.broadcast_no = b.no JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON b.schedule_no = bs.no WHERE v.status = 0
AND bs.category_no = #{categoryNo}

SELECT v.no AS vodNo, bs.name AS title, bs.thumbnail_path AS thumbnailPath, b.no AS broadcastNo FROM broadcast_vod v JOIN broadcast b ON v.broadcast_no = b.no JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON b.schedule_no = bs.no WHERE v.status = 0 ORDER BY v.created_at DESC

SELECT v.no AS vodNo, v.broadcast_no AS broadcastNo, c.name AS category_name, bs.name AS title, bs.thumbnail_path AS thumbnailPath, v.vod_path AS vodPath, v.view_count AS viewCount, v.duration AS duration, v.created_at AS createdAt FROM broadcast_vod v JOIN broadcast b ON v.broadcast_no = b.no JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON b.schedule_no = bs.no JOIN category c ON bs.category_no = c.no WHERE b.user_no = #{lawyerNo} ORDER BY v.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM broadcast_vod v JOIN broadcast b ON v.broadcast_no = b.no WHERE b.user_no = #{lawyerNo}
